item.title: How to easily mount ISO files for Apache
item.description: I play with yum repositories and ISO files very often, therefore it is vital to have such files and directories avaiable via local Apache httpd. I had this idea of mounting ISO files into directories and using these as yum repositories. I leveraged fuseiso program, but there's a trick.
